dc_description_s: Map has border text. "China and the tributary kingdom of Corea. For the elucidation of Lavoisne's Genealogical, historical, chronological & geographical atlas, by C. Gros. 1821." This map is no. 64 in Lavoisne's A complete genealogical, historical, chronological and geographical atlas..."Third Philadelphia edition, 1821...from the London Edition of 1817." For the 2d ed., 1820, see D 21.5 .L41 1820. 1 map: hand col.; 21 x 26 cm on sheet 48 x 53 cm This map is in the public domain. Please attribute access and use of this digitized map to the Stephen S. Clark Library, University of Michigan Library.
dc_title_s: Geographical and historical map of China.
